means: 改进，改善，改良，增进，进步
更优秀的人，更进步的人

sentence.Network_cn: 激光唱片极大地提高了录音的音质。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English emprowement (in the sense 'profitable management or use; profit'), from Anglo-Norman French, from emprower (see improve)

entry.def: If there is an improvement in something, it becomes better. If you make improvements to something, you make it better.

example.ex: ...the dramatic improvements in organ transplantation in recent years...
example.tran: 近几年器官移植方面取得的巨大进步

example.ex: There is considerable room for improvement in state facilities for treating the mentally handicapped.
example.tran: 国家现有的用于智障病人治疗的设施还有相当大的改进余地。

entry.tran: 更优秀之物;改善的事物
entry.def: If you say that something is an improvement on a previous thing or situation, you mean that it is better than that thing.

example.ex: The new Prime Minister is an improvement on his predecessor...
example.tran: 新上任的总理比他的前任要强。

example.ex: The system we introduced in 1980 has been a great improvement.
example.tran: 我们 1980 年引进的系统有了很大改进。

sentences.sentence: "their improvements increased the value of the property"

means.word_mean: 2. a change for the better; progress in development
3. a condition superior to an earlier condition;

sentences.sentence: "the new school represents a great improvement"

stems_affixes.word_buile: approve赞成,赞许,同意+al表名词→n.批准,通过;赞成,同意
improve[v.改善, 改进]+ment表名词→n.改进,进步

stems_affixes.value_cn: 证据, 试验, 考验
stems_affixes.word_buile: proof=prov测试,证明→n.&v.证据, 试验, 考验

stems_affixes.value_cn: [of]赞成,赞许,同意;批准,审议,通过
stems_affixes.word_buile: ap加强+prov测试,证明+e→证明可行
dis不+approve赞成,赞许,同意→v.不赞成,不同意[批准]
dis不+prov测试,证明+e→v.证明…不正确,反证
im进入+prove检验, 考验→进入试验→改善, 改进

stems_affixes.value_cn: 证明, 证实, 检验, 考验
stems_affixes.word_buile: prov测试,证明+e→v.证明, 证实, 检验, 考验 v.原来[是], 证明[是]
re反+prov测试,证明+e→反[别人]证明→责骂

There was plenty of room for improvement
With culinary improvement in recent years, London's restaurants are now able to appeal to the tastes of    .

Still, there's a huge disconnect between the way we currently train scientists and the actual employment opportunities available for them, and an urgent need for dramatic improvements in training programs to help close the gap.
The most interesting thing we found was that if the relationship managed to continue for just 10 weeks, we could see an improvement in racial attitudes.
The US judicial system has much room for improvement

sentences.en: There is room for further improvement in English.
sentences.cn: 你的英语尚有进一步提高的余地。

means.word_mean: 改进, 改善, 改良

sentences.cn: 你的工作显示出相当大的改进。

jushi.english: Today's weather is an improvement on yesterday's.
They were carrying out home improvements.
I have noticed a number of improvements in this town since I was here last.
jushi.chinese: 我注意到,自从我上次到这儿来过之后,这个市镇有了很大的改进。
